name: Doodle Defense (itch) (Sleeping Robot Games, Music by Young, Memao, devbang, nymsical)
name_original: Doodle Defense (itch) (Sleeping Robot Games, Music by Young, Memao, devbang, nymsical)
description:
Trijam #204: The 3 hour game jam
Theme: Blocked      

                                                    

The Rats are coming for your Meowy Kingdom! Drop blocks for Combos or to crush Rats

A new random colored Block drops every few seconds. 

Get 3 Blocks of the same color in a row or column for a Combo. Combos kill 3 Rats and give Score

How long can you defend the Cat King?

 



CREDITS
Doodle Defense was made using Godot and  Aseprite.
 
Artist - Dingzhong Hu (Devbang)
Artist - Jenna Wing-Hu (Memao)
Developer - Bryan Reed (Bronsky)  
Developer - Ross Root (SleepingRobot)  
Music/SFX - Tyler Young (Young Tango)

     
    Sleeping Robot Games
